title: X-tra Special
prompt: Wolverine has secretly sent you a Valentine note. Can you find the secret message in his note?

title: Heart Over Hardware
prompt:
Dear rookies,
I’ve intercepted a C code from Von Nebula, and it’s up to you to analyze it.

Take the code and paste it into an online C editor, like OnlineGDB.
If you’re using OnlineGDB, make sure you have two inputs, with the second one on the line below the first.
Study the code carefully as it contains information you will need later in CyberChef and stay alert because Corroder, Meltdown, Rotor, and XPlode are likely to try and distract you.

I won’t be on this mission with you this time; I’m on the front line trying to stop Von Nebula from opening a blackhole vortex.
I can’t leave the battle, and I don’t know the exact location of the vortex controls.

The flag you recover from this code is the key to shutting down the vortex.
If you don’t get it in time, Von Nebula could succeed, the vortex will form, and we won’t be able to celebrate Valentine’s Day.

Move fast, stay sharp, and complete the mission rookies.
The fate of the galaxy depends on you.

- Stormer
hint:
Count carefully how long the service log can be, then consider what character comes immediately after it in memory.

Here are some examples to consider (these won’t work, but maybe you can find a pattern):

aB3dE9FhJkLmN2PqR4sT5U6VW7XyZ8A1bCDeF2G3H4I5J6K7L8M9N0PqRstUVwXVy
9ZyXWvUTsRqP0N8M7L6KJ5H4G3F2EdCbA1zYxWvUTsRqP0N8M7L6KJ5H4G3F2EdCy
QwErTyUiOpAsDfGhJkLzXcVbNm1234567890aBcDEfGhIjKlMnOpQrStUvWxYzABy
mN8BvC0ZxQ2S7YwPE5T4kH1DR9A6FJ3LUOeWqKMGpXcIayhslVf0rZ8tdB2C9N7Py
AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHhIiJjKkLlMmNnOoPpQqRrSsTtUuVvWwXxYyZz0123456789aby

title: Hunny, I Encrypted the Flag
prompt:
Pooh Bear has been sent a message from a mysterious wizard. The wizard covered the message in magical HUNNY. Here is the message:
4i 5u 4o 54 53 59 4o 57 4y 42 32 47 53 59 53 48 4j 4u 59 47 49 33 42 5n 4r 35 4c 45 51 57 52 53 4j 49 5u 56 55 34 43 59 47 4n 53 48 55 5n 4a 4l 47 46 54 47 47 4x 53 32 4s 52 52 46 4s 53 52 5y.

The wizard has provided this message for Pooh:
Oh d dear… the message was first t turned on its head at bash, where each little letter scurried off to meet its distant twin.
Th then, with a puff of magic, it was lifted into a broader shape, padded ever so carefully until it fit a familiar sixty-four symbol mold.
N next, the symbols were gently squeezed together, becoming a simpler pattern of thirty-two marks, before being hardened into raw hex, if you please.
A and finally, an old Vigenere charm was wrapped around the whole thing, with a quiet key guiding the very last layer of disguise.

Help Pooh decode the message so he can know what it says. Maybe use CyberChef.
hint: Did you find the magical key for Vigenere?
